hed: The 2018 Oscar Nominees, in Google Search
description: How this year’s Best Picture Oscar nominees took over the globe

prelude.value: Each year, films nominated for the Academy Award for Best Picture reach hundreds of millions of viewers around the world. And yet, each resonates with its global audiences in markedly different ways. Were this year’s blockbusters, like Get Out, as beloved in Asia as they were in America? Were historical films, such as Dunkirk, more popular in the United Kingdom than the other Best Picture contenders?
The map below shows the most popular Oscar-nominated films in each country
